content: You can disable the title of the current section/room/folder.

comment.text: The "ManagerTitleDescription" translation key is used to describe the tooltip content that appears next to a button or label in certain UI elements, explaining the purpose of disabling section/folder titles. It appears in developer tools and room settings pages, where users can toggle this feature on/off. Translators should provide an equivalent description for users in other languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "section/room/folder" is translated as "القسم/الغرفة/المجلد". While technically correct, it might be more natural and user-friendly in Arabic to use a more encompassing term for 'section' depending on the context. The translation could be improved by considering a term like 'الجزء' (al-juz') or 'المنطقة' (al-mintaqa) for 'section' if it fits the overall application’s terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising the term for 'section' to something like 'الجزء' or 'المنطقة' if appropriate for the application context. Alternatively, confirm with the content owner if 'القسم' accurately represents the intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'söndürə bilərsiniz' (can extinguish) doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'disable' in this context. 'Disable' implies a temporary deactivation or hiding, not a complete extinguishing.

The translation 'Можете да деактивирате заглавието на текущия раздел/стая/папка' is a literal translation and might not be the most natural phrasing in Bulgarian. 'Деактивирате' (deactivate) is a bit formal and 'заглавие' (title) might be better expressed as 'име' (name) in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете да изключите името на текущия раздел/стая/папка.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Název aktuální sekce/místnosti/složky můžete vypnout" literally translates to 'You can disable the name of the current section/room/folder'. The English says 'You can disable the title...', which implies disabling the title display or heading, not disabling the name itself.  'Vypnout' (disable) is a suitable verb, but needs to be applied to the title, not the name.

The English phrase "section/room/folder" is somewhat vague. "Sala" typically implies a room. While it can work for folder, the Spanish translation could be more precise depending on the context. Consider alternatives for a more accurate representation of all three terms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider revising to something like: 'Puede desactivar el título de la sección, sala o carpeta actual.' or a more context-specific alternative.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'section/room/folder' is not accurately translated. 'Salle' typically refers to a room, and while it can sometimes mean 'hall,' 'section' and 'folder' need more nuanced translations. Using 'section/salle/dossier' is somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a rephrasing to improve flow and accuracy. Options include: 'Vous pouvez désactiver le titre de la section, de la salle ou du dossier actuel' or 'Vous pouvez désactiver le titre de la section courante, de la salle ou du dossier.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'վերնագիրը' (vernagiry) which means 'title' is correct, but might be more formally 'նշանակումը' (nshanakumy) which means 'the designation' or 'the name'.  While 'վերնագիրը' is acceptable, 'նշանակումը' might be slightly better in a more technical context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'նշանակումը' instead of 'վերնագիրը' for a more technical feel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ປິດການທໍາງານຫົວຂໍ້' is too literal and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'disable the title'. A more natural translation would be something like 'ເຊົາໃຊ້ຫົວຂໍ້' or 'ບໍ່ໃຊ້ຫົວຂໍ້'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເຊົາໃຊ້ຫົວຂໍ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ພາກສ່ວນ / ຫ້ອງ / folder ປະຈຸບັນ' could be improved for better flow. While technically correct, it reads a little awkwardly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ພາກສ່ວນ, ຫ້ອງ ຫຼື folder ປະຈຸບັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Jūs varat atspējot pašreizējās sadaļas/telpas/mapes nosaukumu' is a literal translation but doesn't quite convey the meaning of 'disable the title'. A more natural translation would imply removing or hiding the title.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Jūs varat paslēpt/noņemt pašreizējās sadaļas/telpas/mapes nosaukumu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Você pode desativar o título da seção/sala/pasta atual' is technically correct but could be more natural sounding. 'Desativar' implies a complete disabling. A more appropriate term might convey a less restrictive action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Você pode ocultar o título da seção/sala/pasta atual.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'folderului' is missing an accent. It should be 'folderului'.

The translation 'ඔබට වත්මන් කොටසේ/කාමරයේ/බහාලුමේ සිරැසිය අබල කිරීමට හැකිය' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'You can disable the title of the current section/room/folder.'.  'සිරැසිය' translates to 'constraint' or 'restriction', not 'title'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට වත්මන් කොටස/කාමරය/බහාලුමේ හිසව නිශ්චල කිරීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'නිශ්චල' is a valid word, in this context 'අයින්' or 'ತೆಗೆශීමට' would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට වත්මන් කොටස/කාමරය/බහාලුමේ හිසව අයින් කිරීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Naslov trenutnega razdelka/sobe/mape lahko onemogočite' is a literal translation and sounds slightly awkward in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of disabling the title.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Naslova trenutnega razdelka/sobe/mape je mogoče onemogočiti.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'онемогуц́ите' appears to be misspelled. The correct spelling should be 'онемогућите'.
The word 'fascikle' is likely a typo and should be 'datoteke' or 'maper' for better clarity in context. 'Fascikle' isn't a standard term for folders in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Možete da onemogućite naslov trenutnog odeljka/sobe/datoteke.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Geçerli bölümün/odanın/klasörün başlığını devre dışı bırakabilirsiniz' is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Geçerli' (current) feels slightly formal in this context. While not incorrect, a more natural phrasing could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Mevcut bölümün/odanın/klasörün başlığını devre dışı bırakabilirsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'vô hiệu hóa' can be perceived as overly technical or negative. While technically correct, a more natural and user-friendly translation might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bạn có thể tắt tiêu đề của phần/phòng/thư mục hiện tại.
